reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is very knowledgeable and passionate about biology. Her lectures are engaging, but the workload can be heavy at times.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Prof. Chang explains complex concepts clearly and is always available for office hours. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's course content is interesting, but her lectures can be a bit disorganized. Grading is fair.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is great at breaking down difficult math concepts. His homework assignments are challenging but helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's passion for literature is contagious. Her class discussions are thought-provoking and inspiring.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Lee seems knowledgeable, but his teaching style is confusing. Labs are poorly organized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Wang provides real-world examples that make economic theories easier to understand. Fair grader and approachable.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's lectures can be dry, but the course content is interesting. Be prepared for a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is an amazing professor! Her classes are engaging and she encourages critical thinking. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown explains complex physics concepts well. His problem sets are challenging but helpful for exam preparation.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White's enthusiasm for art history is infectious. Her lectures are like storytelling sessions. Absolutely loved this class!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are often off-topic and confusing. Grading seems arbitrary at times.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green is passionate about environmental issues. Field trips were a great addition to the course.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Nguyen knows the material well but can be impatient with questions. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's class discussions are thought-provoking and enlightening. She encourages students to think critically.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Kim brings real-world marketing experience to the classroom. Group projects were challenging but valuable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's lectures are informative but can be monotonous. The course readings are interesting and well-selected.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is an excellent teacher who makes music theory accessible and fun. His passion for music is evident in every class.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Adams explains complex neurological concepts clearly. The lab work is fascinating, but the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez has extensive knowledge of the field, but his lectures can be hard to follow. Office hours are helpful.
